version_description:
Version 4.0.1

• Updated dictionaries
• Handling of accents in the URLs of external resources
• Various minor fixes

Version 4.0

GENERAL

• New bilingual application
• Available as part of Antidote+
• Synchronization with Antidote 10 and Antidote Web (with Antidote+ plan)
• Sign-in using Druide account, Apple Sign In, Google, etc.

INTERFACE

• Full dark mode support
• 14 Siri shortcuts: definitions, synonyms, etc.
• Adaptation to dynamic fonts
• Updated display
• Handling of new external keyboard (Magic)
• Simplified interaction
• Clear shortcuts to all functions
• Standardized icons


ENGLISH

—— Definitions
• More than 16,000 new words and expressions (pegan, upcycle, anthropolatric)
• COVID and remote work vocabulary (superspreader, community transmission, teleworking)
• 12,000 new difficulties
• New World Heritage sites
• 500 new maps
• Note on appropriate article (a/an) for difficult words (e.g. history)
• Note on words which may require the subjunctive (e.g. advice)
• Note on required use of infinitive or gerund after certain verbs (e.g. thank)
• Note on contracted form of auxiliaries (e.g. shan’t)
• Expanded presentation of inflections and phonetics

—— Synonyms
• Close to 200,000 new synonyms
• Display of the hierarchy of hyponyms and hypernyms
• Sort by relevance, frequency or length
• Filter for synonyms without labels (not informal, not regional, etc.)
• Filter for strong, weak or neutral synonyms

—— Antonyms
• 128,000 antonyms in 32,000 entries
• Display by sense groups

—— Combinations
• 48,000 new combinations
• Notes on language register

—— Semantic fields
• Close to 475,000 new links
• Semantic fields for proper nouns

—— History
• 9500 new etymologies
• 335,000 new etymologically related words
• 40 new etymology notes

—— Guides
• 150 new articles (508 in total)
• Cleaner display
• Creation of article lists
